IT Works!
i am usin 10.5.8

1. Downloaded and installed AC2.
2. Launched 'AC2 Launcher'.
3. Got asked if Python should accept incoming traffic (or something like that).
4. Answered yes.
5. Got to a screen saying 'Please Log In'
6. Tried 'Register now'
7. Signed up with username, real email and real birth date.
8. Got a cryptic message that 'an Internet connection is needed to play AC'. 
9. Gave up.

When the log in screen appears (presuming that you've run the cracked launcher first) just log in with any username and password you want.  Type keys at random - as long as the password is over six characters long.

It actually works.

Here's what you do:
1. Download game http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5880449/ 
2. Download the crack
3. Install the game
4. Place your crack anywhere on your drive
5. Run the crack
6. When log in page appears insert a username that you like and insert a password 6 characters long and atleast 1 letter and 1 number.
7. Game starts etc etc.
8. Make sure you use same log in data that you've used the first time to retrieve your last game saves.
9. Make sure you do only like one mission, profie gets saved and then quit the application. Restart your mac and start the game again with the same log in data. Just so if you did something wrong you don't get angry for losing a long gameplay :P
10. Enjoy the game.
